title: Pitch Perfect: Restaurants, bars curate cricket-themed menu, line-up goodies and offers for Ind-Pak match
description: Restaurants and bars in the national capital region of India are gearing up to celebrate the high-tension World Cup match between India and Pakistan. They are offering cricket-themed menus, quirky goodies, and discounts to attract customers. Some establishments have dishes named after cricketers, while others offer free shots and food for every Pakistani wicket that falls.
